瀶字的基本解释

瀶
lín
山谷。
寒冷。
水出貌。
古同“临”。
古同“淋”。

瀶字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lín］
［《廣韻》力尋切，平侵，來。］
(1)峡谷。
(2)寒冽。
(3)水出貌。

瀶字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　瀶； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页661第07
【唐韻】力尋切【集韻】犁針切，?音林。【說文】谷也。一曰寒也。一曰瀶瀶，雨也。【集韻】或省作?。又从兼作溓。又或書作?。

瀶字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
瀶字的起名意思

暂无。

瀶
Basic explanation of words
瀶
lín
valley.
cold.
The water looks good.
Gu Tong "Pro".
Gu Tong "drenched".
瀶
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lín］
["Guangyun" strives to find cutting, flat invasion, come. ]
(1) Canyon.
(2) Cold.
(3) The appearance of water.
瀶
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Character Department] 　瀶; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 661 No. 07
[Tang Yun] Seek to cut [Ji Yun] Plow needle cutting,? Yinlin. [Said the text] Gu Ye. One said cold. One said, 瀶瀶, rain. [Ji Yun] Or province for?. Also from the double as the 溓. Or book?
